job.title: Jr. Data Analyst

remoteltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtThe RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are looking for a passionate Junior Data Analyst with a technical foundation and a strong desire to learn In this role you will etc ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkills Competenciesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Experience with data visualization and dashboarding tools preferably Tableau ltligtltligt Experience working in a Linux environment ltligtltligt Working knowledge of Git ampamp Github ltligtltligt Desire to be in a crossfunctional team where openminded and transparent sharing is a tool for breaking down challenging problems ltligtltligt Passion for tackling ambiguous problem and creating tangible outcomes â€¯ ltligtltligt Insatiable curiosity and a growth mindset ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Well Give You ltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtltstronggtltugt Competitive Pay and Bonuses  ltugtltstronggt Weve created a variety of competitive
